data.eml:eml: Morphological variation and affinities of the poorly known snake Atractus caxiuana (Serpentes: Dipsadidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Passos, Paulo, Ramos, Luciana O., Pinna, Pedro H., Prudente, Ana L. C. (2013): Morphological variation and affinities of the poorly known snake Atractus caxiuana (Serpentes: Dipsadidae). Zootaxa 3745 (1): 35-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3745.1.3
